cleaned_text: noun is a word referring to a person, animal, place, thing, feeling or idea (e.g. man, dog, house). [noun](http://www.spanishdict.com/guide/masculine-and-feminine-nouns) 1. (botany) a. [la amanita](/translate/la%20amanita) (f) means that a noun is feminine. Spanish nouns have a gender, which is either feminine (like la mujer or la luna) or masculine (like el hombre or el sol). [(F)](http://www.spanishdict.com/guide/masculine-and-feminine-nouns) Those bright red mushrooms are amanitas.Esos hongos amanitas. [Copyright Random the dice and learn a new word now!
